Description.Text: City Suites is located in Willemstad (Punda), minutes from Jewish Cultural Historical Museum and Mikve Israel-Emanuel Synagogue.Fort Amsterdam and Governors Palace are a few steps away.In room amenities includes kitchenette, refrigerator, microwave, Plasma TV, free Wi-Fi , iron/ironing board, air conditioning, expresso maker and daily housekeeping.The hotel also provides car rental. Curacao Sea Aquarium is a few miles from City Suites Curacao. The nearest airport is Hato Airport, 6 miles from City Suites Curacao.
